name: Cardano Staking Trio
description:
CAST Pool is managed by a trio of young but experienced IT engineers in order to offer you the best staking experience as a delegator or an institute. 
 Our servers offer performance, high availability and reliability, and are monitored 24/7 with real time alerting tools. 
 One of our goals is to donate 10% of our net profits each quarter to charities in Africa and around the globe. 
 We will also be endorsing renewable energy projects in the future.
